headline: Does the Recent Price Drop Signal Opportunity for Brown-Forman in 2025?
summary: Thinking about whether Brown-Forman is a bargain right now? Let’s dig into the value behind this iconic beverage stock and see if there is opportunity brewing for investors. The shares have seen a little recovery with a 4.8% pop over the past week and 2.6% gain across the last month. However, they are still down 25.0% year-to-date and almost 30% in the past year. Brown-Forman’s recent price moves come on the back of shifts in sentiment regarding consumer staples and the continued resilience...
